County Clare is looking solid today with 4 ft @ 11s W swell and a light 11 mph SW wind. Doolin Point and Lahinch Beach are prime spots, both offering fun waves throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 9 ft @ 12s WSW swell and fresh 23 mph SSW winds, making it blown out across the board. The day after continues the trend with 7 ft @ 12s WSW and even stronger 30 mph S winds, keeping it poor. Best: today.
